body: Wish the mom was more prominent in the story.
You know this was really good back in the day. But idk why you guys keep uploading this...
As much as I enjoy Ishikei's work, motherfucker need to move on already! Explore some other wenches aside from those two dammit!

@LoveLightning TWO standalone chapter with the mom!? Can you please link? The only material I was aware of with the mom is those 3 or 4 color pages in the original story where the son is sleepwalking.
the mom does have two standalone chapters in the tank but I agree she needs a lot more

Good lord. The mom is infinitely hotter than the daughter, I wish the author did a doujin with her alone or her taking most of the spotlight...
By the way, I believe that black and white epilogue page indicates that the mom clearly remembers what happened because she gave the son oysters that are known to be rich in zinc and are basically aphrodisiacs for men... I don't know about the bitter gourds though but I heard they reduce sperm count...so it's probably as a safety measure if he cums inside her or his sister again?

You know I've always been wondering, is their Dad like dead or something? Out of all the illustrations of the mother done by Ishikei, we have never once saw her wear a ring or mention anything about her husband, apart from indirectly, by saying it's been a while since she last had sex.
